act.title: Dialog Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 好的，先生，您想吃点什么？
item.pinyin: Hǎo de, xiānsheng, nín xiǎng chī diǎn shénme?

item.hanzi: 你们这里什么菜最有名？
item.pinyin: Nǐmen zhèlǐ shénme cài zuì yǒumíng?

item.hanzi: 那就给我来一份糖醋鱼。
item.pinyin: Nà jiù gěi wǒ lái yī fèn tángcùyú.

item.hanzi: 再来一瓶啤酒，一盘青菜。
item.pinyin: Zài lái yī píng píjiǔ, yī pán qǐngcài.
